title: Shopee Store Metrics Paid Orders Daily Monthly Report
description: Daily and monthly report presenting key metrics for paid orders in a Shopee store

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'MM-DD-YYYY'

Sales_per_Order.description: Average sales amount per order information

Page_Views.description: Total number of page views in the store

Visitors.description: Total number of visitors to the store

Conversion_Rate_by_paid_order.description: Conversion rate from store visit to paid order as a percentage

Cancelled_Sales.description: Sales amount information for cancelled orders

Returned_Refunded_Orders.description: Total number of returned or refunded orders

Returned_Refunded_Sales.description: Sales amount information for returned or refunded orders

No_of_buyers.description: Total number of buyers who made a purchase

Repeat_Purchase_Rate.description: Rate of repeat purchases as a percentage
